2815.name: BANNED_DEVICE_IN_INDEPENDENT_SERVICE
2815.message:
Online services cannot be used.

Please make a note of the error code
and visit support.nintendo.com.
2815.short_description: Your console is permanently banned from this service.
2815.long_description: Your console has been permanently banned from this service for breaking the rules.
2815.short_solution: Appeal the ban on the forum.
